items.headline: Strategy’s stock falls to 7-month low. Why the leveraged bitcoin play is losing steam.
items.summary_en: Shares of Strategy ended at their lowest level in seven months, a sign that investors may be growing cautious about Saylor’s highly leveraged bitcoin-buying playbook.

items.headline: Cava trims sales outlook amid heavy competition. But it’s wary of diving into the discounting fray.

items.headline: Medicare recipients may get obesity drugs for just $149 a month under a reported White House deal in the works
items.summary_en: The White House is close to announcing a deal with drugmakers Eli Lilly and Novo Nordisk that would cut the price of obesity drugs to $149 per month in some cases and extend coverage to certain Medicare and Medicaid beneficiaries, according to media reports Tuesday.
